properties.areaDesc: Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 12:42PM MST until February 9 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...SNOW LATE TODAY INTO TOMORROW...

.The next storm system will impact the area beginning this
afternoon. Heavy upslope snow is expected over the northern Black
Hills and adjacent foothills late tonight through tomorrow
morning, bringing several inches of new snow. Additionally, a band
of heavy snow will move across northwestern South Dakota this
afternoon and evening. High snowfall rates within this band could
lead to rapid onset of hazardous travel conditions. Snow showers
are expected elsewhere across northeastern Wyoming and western
South Dakota through tonight before tapering off early tomorrow.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches
with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as
35 mph.

* WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Northern Foot
Hills.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the
5 1 1 app for your state.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY
